title: 'Flip or Flop' Star Christina El Moussa Welcomes Her First Son With Husband Ant Anstead
text:
View photos Photo credit: Christina El Moussa/Instagram More

From Country Living

Baby Anstead has arrived!

Christina El Moussa and her husband Ant Anstead welcomed their first child together on September 6. Hudson London Anstead was born in the morning and weighs seven pounds and seven ounces, and is 19.5 inches long. Their son joins Christina’s two kids, Taylor, 8, and Brayden, 4—who she shares with ex-husband Tarek El Moussa—and Ant’s children, Amelie, 15, and Archie, 12, from a former marriage.

The Flip or Flop star announced the news via Instagram, happily sharing that she had delivered a "healthy baby boy."

Ant also posted the same photo, echoing his wife's joy. "I am in awe! Mummy and baby are simply perfect!" he wrote.

Christina took to Instagram in early September to open up about the last leg of her pregnancy, specifically that she had decided to schedule a C-section.

“I chose to do this because I had an emergency c-section with Brayden and the whole experience and recovery was really hard on me physically and emotionally,” she explained. “I really don’t feel comfortable trying to go down that route again. Bray was 8lbs 13oz—after pushing for hours and hours—he was just stuck and his heart rate was dropping. Based on ultrasound measurements we think this is going to be another big boy so this is the direction we’ve decided to take.”

She also admitted that she was “not sleeping, irritable, and uncomfortable,” but that she couldn’t wait to meet their “little man.”

Now that he’s here, we can’t wait to see more photos of him. Congrats to their adorable family!
